tool_description: Monitors and analyzes news coverage and sentiment about target companies to identify sales opportunities and timing for outreach campaigns.

company_names.description: List of company names to monitor

start_date.description: Start date for news monitoring period

end_date.description: End date for news monitoring period

sentiment_threshold.description: Minimum sentiment level to report: positive, neutral, negative, all

keywords_filter.description: Specific keywords to filter news coverage

include_social_media.description: Whether to include social media mentions

max_articles.description: Maximum number of articles to analyze per company

error_messages: Invalid date range: end_date must be after start_date
Date range too long: Maximum monitoring period is 365 days
Invalid sentiment threshold: Use positive, neutral, negative, or all
Company not found: One or more company names not recognized
No news found: No news coverage found for specified companies and criteria
Invalid max_articles: Must be between 1 and 200
usage: Provide company names and date range for monitoring. Optionally filter by news sources, sentiment, or keywords. The tool returns sentiment analysis and key news insights.

overall_sentiment.description: Overall sentiment across all companies: positive, neutral, negative

company_sentiment_scores.description: Individual sentiment scores for each company (-100 to 100)

key_news_themes.description: Main themes and topics in news coverage

opportunity_indicators.description: Potential sales opportunities identified from news

total_articles_analyzed.description: Total number of news articles analyzed
